00029     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030     pipe_conv_transform::pipe_conv_transform(pipe_conv* source, 
00031                                              const affine_matrix* matrix)
00032         : m_source(source), m_matrix(matrix)
00033     {
00034     }
00035 
00036     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     void pipe_conv_transform::reset_iterator(unsigned start)
00038     {
00039         m_source->reset_iterator(start);
00040     }
00041 
00042     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     pathflag_e pipe_conv_transform::next_vertex(double* x, double* y)
00044     {
00045         pathflag_e flag = m_source->next_vertex(x, y);
00046         if(flag != pathflag_stop)
00047         {
00048             m_matrix->transform(x, y);
00049         }
00050         return flag;
00051     }
